emails.name: api-source-sportsweekly
emails.example: Data source used to display the current 10 trending articles on Sky Sports News.

emails.name: api-source-store
emails.example: Data source connected to Sky Store website to display the most recent additions in the hero imagery.

emails.name: calendar-sports-1
emails.example: Calendar invitations used to mark different sporting events.

emails.name: calendar-mobile-swap
emails.example: Calendar invitations used to remind customer of date they can swap their mobile device.

emails.name: calendar-sports-2
emails.example: Calendar invitations used to mark different sporting events.

emails.name: value-sports
emails.example:
Dynamic image used to personalise the shirt with the customers surname in the hero pod. Dynamic images also used in the stats pod to maintain the Sky Sports branding.

Bar Chart used to display a customers most watched sports and percentage breakdown of time spent viewing each of those sports.

emails.name: timer-broadband
emails.example: Countdown timer set to fixed offer end date.

emails.name: dmo-bau
emails.example:
Countdown timer set to a dynamic date passed in from a data flag.

Dynamic image used for the pricing lockup to maintain Sky spectrum branding.

emails.name: timer-dmo-bf
emails.example: Countdown timer set to fixed offer end date.

emails.name: timer-dynamo
emails.example: Countdown timer set to coincide with show start time.

emails.name: timer-f1
emails.example: Countdown timer with start of F1 season branding, counting down to a race start time.

emails.name: timer-f1-2
emails.example: Countdown timer with start of F1 branding, counting down to a race start time.

emails.name: timer-sports
emails.example: Countdown timers for multiple sporting event start times

emails.name: deadlineday
emails.example: Dynamic images used to personalise the 'Transfer rumours' with customers full name and on the pricing lockup to maintain Sports branding. Countdown timer built in Deadline Day branding and counts down to transfer deadline time. This email deploys on Deadline Day itself, so only hours and mins are displayed.

emails.name: homemove
emails.example: Dynamic image personalises the top part of the moving checklist with a customers firstname.

emails.name: scratch-alwayson-mobile
emails.example: Scratch card offer reveal.

emails.name: scratch-winback
emails.example: Scratch card offer reveal.

emails.name: scratch-cinema
emails.example: Scratch card offer reveal.

emails.name: weather-stormy
emails.example: Dynamic weather pod to display current weather at time of email open. This creative was sent preemptively of bad weather to offer a free Sky Store movie as an option to watch during any Sky disruption during that bad weather.

emails.name: weather-netflix
emails.example: Dynamic weather displayed above the hero. Weather details pulled in at time of email open.

emails.name: weather-riviera
emails.example: Temperature details pulled in dynamically at time of email open. This creative was sent during the Summer to coincide with show release and nicer weather. The Sun and 'Sunshine and secrets' copy are hardcoded and not dynamic.
